item.title: Make Req
item.dc:creator: @vato vato
item.description:
@vato wrote:

how do i make level reqs for a stat to enter a place…

somewhat like this?

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“Fletchguild”) && playerLevel[9] =100 {
if(teleblock == true){
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”);
}
else
{

  teleportToX = 3424;
  teleportToY = 9891;

sendMessage(“You teleport to the Fletch Guild”);
}
}[/code]
would that work?i REALLY doubt it…

Read full topic
